April 28, 2016 <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/burning-houses-and-happy-operations-afa8f6cc854a#.ysuiqdk7m]]> Burning Houses and Happy Operations We recently caught up with engineer Topher Lubaway at the Pivotal San Francisco office and talked about fighting fires, DevOps, automation, and sleeping better at night. Read The Interview <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/burning-houses-and-happy-operations-afa8f6cc854a#.ysuiqdk7m]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/meet-pcf-dev-your-ticket-to-running-cloud-foundry-locally]]> Meet PCF Dev: Your Ticket To Running Cloud Foundry Locally PCF Dev is a new Pivotal product that allows developers to run a nearly feature-complete Pivotal Cloud Foundry® installation locally in a single virtual machine. Try It <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/meet-pcf-dev-your-ticket-to-running-cloud-foundry-locally]]> <[[https://youtu.be/-mhqPW87CK8]]> The Paradox of Success Watch Siobhan McFeeney, VP of Transformation, share her story about climbing mountains and her personal reorientation of what success is and how she applies what she's learned to her work, her family and her life. Watch the Video <[[https://youtu.be/-mhqPW87CK8]]> <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/community/summits/program/schedule/?summitId=10016]]> Join us at the Cloud Foundry Summit The professional conference for multi-cloud vendors is back, and we’ll be there in full force! More than 20 sessions feature Pivots. There are also training workshops where you can learn Microservices, Cloud Foundry, and BOSH. Get 20% off your ticket by using our code CFNA16PVTL20.
